long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RTL Support for ChatGPT and ChatGPT Plus

This is a useful Chrome extension designed to enhance your user experience by providing right-to-left (RTL) text support for Hebrew and Arabic languages when using OpenAI's ChatGPT and ChatGPT Plus.

This extension is a valuable tool for users who frequently communicate or work in RTL languages. It enables seamless formatting in Hebrew or Arabic, thereby making your interactions with ChatGPT more intuitive and efficient.

Once installed, this extension automatically detects the use of Hebrew or Arabic and adjusts the text direction accordingly within the ChatGPT environment.

Whether you're a researcher, a language enthusiast, a professional in need of AI-powered assistance, or simply someone who regularly uses ChatGPT in RTL languages, this extension is designed to make your interactions smoother and more enjoyable.

Experience an improved ChatGPT experience for Hebrew / Arabic with our tool.
